adventure_overview: Explore how technology has made life easier and the ways to use technology safely. Prior to any activity, use Scouting America SAFE Checklist to ensure the safety of all those involved. All participants in official Scouting America activities should become familiar with the Guide to Safe Scouting and applicable program literature or manuals.

requirements.text: Discover technology around your home, meeting place, or neighborhood.

activities.name: “I Spy” Technology
activities.description: Play a game of “I Spy” to identify everyday technology.

activities.name: What is Technology?
activities.description: Identify objects that are technology and those that are not.

requirements.text: Discover ways that digital technology can make life easier.

activities.name: Grocery Shopping Tech
activities.description: Use a grocery store app for a scaventer hunt in the grocery store.

activities.name: Making Life Easier
activities.description: Identify how technology has made life easier.

activities.name: Technology Memory Game
activities.description: Play a game of memory that matches old technology with new technology.

requirements.text: Identify an item of digital technology you use at home.  Demonstrate to your Lion adult partner how you use it safely.

activities.name: Be Safe with Technology Lion
activities.description: Cub Scouts create rules for the use of digital devices.
